FuncDef: This command controls the creation of log events related to dynamic enforcement policer status & activity

ParaDef.Info: This parameter sends the send the same events as just "log-events" plus Hold Down Start, Hold Down End, DcpDynamicEnforceAlloc and DcpDynamicEnforceFreed events. This includes the allocation/de-allocation events (typically used for debug/tuning only - could be very noisy even when there is nothing much of concern).
